AT.name: Tested with robots !
AT.description: You are the new employee of a factory that created levels for video games. You must test each level using robots. -Robots are easy to control, but the levels to be tested are becoming more difficult! -New gameplay elements appear throughout the tests such as enemies or buttons to activate... Some levels are real puzzles! -Three difficulty levels are available as difficulty "extreme" (without checkpoint in levels) and a mode "against the clock" is also included.

BG.name: Tested with robots !
BG.description: You are the new employee of a factory that created levels for video games. You must test each level using robots. -Robots are easy to control, but the levels to be tested are becoming more difficult! -New gameplay elements appear throughout the tests such as enemies or buttons to activate... Some levels are real puzzles! -Three difficulty levels are available as difficulty "extreme" (without checkpoint in levels) and a mode "against the clock" is also included.

BE.name: Tested with robots !
BE.description: Vous êtes le nouvel employé d'une usine qui créé de niveaux pour des jeux vidéo. Vous devez tester chaque niveau à l'aide de robots. -Les robots sont faciles à contrôler, mais les niveaux à tester sont de plus en plus difficiles! -De nouveaux éléments de gameplay apparaissent tout au long des tests comme par exemple des ennemis ou des boutons à activer... Certains niveaux sont de véritables casse-têtes! -Trois niveaux de difficulté sont disponibles comme la difficulté "extrême" (sans point de contrôle dans les niveaux) et un mode "contre-la-montre" est aussi inclus.

movies.name: TESTED WITH ROBOTS ! : vidéo de gameplay

ES.name: Tested with robots !
ES.description: Usted es el nuevo empleado de una fábrica que crea niveles para videojuegos. Usted debe probar cada nivel usando robots. -Robots son fáciles de controlar, pero los niveles a ensayar son cada vez más difícil! -Nuevos elementos de juego aparecen a lo largo de las pruebas, como enemigos o botones para activar... Algunos niveles son rompecabezas de verdad! -Tres niveles de dificultad están disponibles como dificultad "extrema" (sin punto de control de los niveles) y un modo "contra el reloj" también se incluyen.

IT.name: Tested with robots !
IT.description: Tu sei il nuovo dipendente di una fabbrica che ha creato i livelli per i videogiochi. È necessario testare ogni livello di utilizzo di robot. -I robot sono facile da controllare, ma i livelli da testare stanno diventando sempre più difficile! -I nuovi elementi di gioco vengono visualizzati in tutte le prove, come nemici o pulsanti per attivare... Alcuni livelli sono puzzle veri e propri! -Tre livelli di difficoltà sono disponibili come difficoltà "estrema" (senza punto di controllo dei livelli) e una modalità "contro il tempo" è anche incluso.

You must test each level using robots. -Robots are easy to control, but the levels to be tested are becoming more difficult! -New gameplay elements appear throughout the tests such as enemies or buttons to activate... Some levels are real puzzles! -Three difficulty levels are available as difficulty "extreme" (without checkpoint in levels) and a mode "against the clock" is also included.

NL.name: Tested with robots !
NL.description: U bent de nieuwe werknemer van een fabriek die niveaus voor video games gemaakt. Je moet elk level te testen met behulp van robots. -Robots zijn eenvoudig te bedienen, maar de niveaus te testen worden steeds moeilijker! -Nieuwe gameplay-elementen verschijnen gedurende de tests, zoals vijanden of knoppen om te activeren... Sommige levels zijn echt puzzels! -Drie moeilijkheidsgraden zijn beschikbaar als moeilijkheden "extreme" (zonder checkpoint in niveaus) en een modus "tegen de klok" is ook inbegrepen.

PL.name: Tested with robots !

You must test each level using robots. -Robots are easy to control, but the levels to be tested are becoming more difficult! -New gameplay elements appear throughout the tests such as enemies or buttons to activate... Some levels are real puzzles! -Three difficulty levels are available as difficulty "extreme" (without checkpoint in levels) and a mode "against the clock" is also included.

PT.name: Tested with robots !
PT.description: Você é o novo funcionário de uma fábrica que criou níveis para jogos de vídeo. Você deve testar cada nível usando robôs. -Robôs são fáceis de controlar, mas os níveis a serem testados são cada vez mais difícil! -Novos elementos de jogabilidade aparecer ao longo dos testes, como inimigos ou botões para ativar... Alguns níveis são quebra-cabeças de verdade! -Três níveis de dificuldade estão disponíveis como dificuldade "extremo" (sem posto de controle em níveis) e um modo "contra o relógio" também está incluído.
